description: Discover millions of historical photographs, works of art, maps, and scientific images.
searchPlaceholder: Search for images (e.g., Apollo 11, Van Gogh)

collections.metDesc: Over 400,000 high-resolution images of public-domain works from The Metropolitan Museum of Art.
collections.nasaDesc: A vast collection of images, videos, and audio from NASA's space exploration missions.
collections.flickrDesc: Images from the world's public photography archives, with no known copyright restrictions.
collections.usgsDesc: A collection of historical topographic maps from the U.S. Geological Survey.
